price: I ne malaksavajte i ne pozivajte primirju kad ste dominantniji, Allah je s vama i On vas neće nagrade za djela vaša lišiti.
arabic: فَلَا تَهِنُواْ وَتَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلسَّلۡمِ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ وَٱللَّهُ مَعَكُمۡ وَلَن يَتِرَكُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: falā tahinū watadʿū ilā al-salmi wa-antumu al-aʿlawna wal-lahu maʿakum walan yatirakum aʿmālakum
